Bind Armament.name: Bind Armament
Bind Armament.description:
You bind the weapon currently equipped in your main-hand as your Bound Armament.

While bound, you may conjure the weapon into a free hand without any resource cost. You can conjure the weapon across any distance including if it has been Disarmed.

bindArmament.name: Bind Armament
bindArmament.description: You bind the weapon currently equipped in your main-hand as your Bound Armament.

conjureArmament.name: Conjure Armament
conjureArmament.description: You call your bound armament back into your grasp. As long as you have sufficient free hands to hold it, the weapon returns instantaneously to you and is no longer Disarmed.

Dawn Beacon.name: Dawn Beacon
Dawn Beacon.description: You call forth the piercing light of dawn that penetrates the darkness around you, revealing the area and dispelling sources of magical darkness.

dawnBeacon.name: Dawn Beacon
dawnBeacon.description:
You create a pillar of magical light centered upon your current position which creates a cylinder of light creating 30 feet of bright light and an additional 30 feet of dim light. The pillar remains in place for 6 rounds or until dispelled.

This magical light counteracts magical darkness and destroys any source of magical darkness whose origin is contained within its area.

Enemies within the area when the light is first created must resist an attack against their Fortitude or be @Condition[blinded] for one round.

WIP: This spell does not yet automatically create a light source, which must be done manually for now. Eventually this will be automated using a new Foundry VTT version 14 framework for template placement.

Engulfing Darkness.name: Engulfing Darkness
Engulfing Darkness.description: You conjure an oppressive sphere of magical darkness that shrouds vision and suffocates light within its area.

engulfingDarkness.name: Engulfing Darkness
engulfingDarkness.description:
You create a sphere of magical darkness around your current position with 20 foot radius which remains in place for 6 rounds or until dispelled.

Within the area of this darkness all non-magical light sources are quenched and creatures are treated as @Condition[blinded].

The area of this sphere is constrained by solid walls. Creatures outside this area cannot see into it and the effective area of light sources outside this area ends at its perimeter.

WIP: This spell does not yet automatically create a darkness source, which must be done manually for now. Eventually this will be automated using a new Foundry VTT version 14 framework for template placement.

Protective Mirage.name: Protective Mirage
Protective Mirage.description: You Aspect yourself in a mirage of shifting Illumination and Shadow which mask your current position and allow you to Elude incoming blows.

protectiveMirage.name: Protective Mirage
protectiveMirage.description: You become surrounded by three illusory duplicates which last up to 10 Rounds. Any incoming Strike against you is made with a number of Banes equal to two times your number of duplicates remaining. Each time a Strike misses you, one of your duplicates disappears.
